message: I'm excited to offer you this unique product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to make an offer?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $12000.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. It's a great product, and I think it's worth every penny.
